setting.help: Turn on to link folders with Odoo Enterprise Documents directories. Such folders might be also synced with any cloud client.
setting.div: The tool Cloud Storage Solutions (Enterprise Documents) (44 Euros extra) is required.

setting.help: Turn on to allow sharing folders and attachments in Odoo's portal and publically (with access tokens)
Turn on to introduce attachment tags and navigation by tags
Define how many days sync logs should be kept in Odoo. The number should not be less than 3 days.

Enter comma-separated mime types without spaces which should not be synced. For example, 'application/pdf,application/vnd.google-apps.spreadsheet''. Take into account that the following mime types will not be synced disregarding this setting: 'text/html', 'text/css', 'text/javascript', 'application/javascript', 'text/xml', 'application/xml'. Besides, empty attachments (with zero size) and attachments that start with '/' would not be taken into account.

Define how many times a failed task should be retried. The retries are done exponentially: 1: 30 minutes; 2: 1 hour; 3: 2 hours; 4: 4 hours, 5: 8 hours, etc. The maximum time will not exceed 24 hours, however
Define how many times failed reverse and move tasks should be retried. Such tasks block any other tasks' fulfillment, so, by default, they should be retried less frequently
Define how many log lines should be prepared while exporting. If the existing logs exceed that number, earlier logs will be neglected

p.b: Use the buttons below only for testing or development purposes!

div.p: All updates assumed by the app are regular and automatic. Both folders' preparation and files' synchronization are based on Odoo's scheduled jobs. Launching those manually might interrupt running processes and, hence, lead to errors. Avoid doing that in production environments.
